rows.label: qst700702_msg0001
rows.name:
We are desperately short-handed, so the work
to clear the rubble from the residential and
shopping districts has been delayed.

rows.label: qst700702_msg0002
rows.name:
In this situation, your help is
greatly appreciated, but, um... I
don't want you to overdo it...

rows.label: qst700702_msg0003
rows.name:
P-Please put your bodies first! If
anything happened, it would be a
bigger problem than the rubble!

rows.label: qst700702_msg0004
rows.name:
Please, please, put your safety
first, I beg of you...!

rows.label: qst700702_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh...! The clearing work
has been completed!?

rows.label: qst700702_msg0102
rows.name:
Thank you so much! Now, if we just
finish the garden maintenance, the
capital will return to its former glory!

rows.label: qst700702_msg0103
rows.name:
I will gather the tools and people
quickly, so if I may, could you please
contact the gardener to begin the work?

rows.label: qst700702_msg0104
rows.name:
The gardener's name is Bry, and he
is already waiting in this garden.

rows.label: qst700702_msg0201
rows.name:
I will gather the tools and people
quickly, so if I may, could you please
contact the gardener to begin the work?

rows.label: qst700702_msg0202
rows.name:
The gardener's name is Bry, and he
is already waiting in this garden.
